level.text: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, all information submitted by a financial institution to the Mayor, or the CFO pursuant to § 47-351.02(c), shall be available for public inspection and reproduction during regular business hours.
Proprietary financial and commercial information of any financial institution shall be kept confidential.
A breach of confidentiality shall be subject to the penalties set forth in § 47-351.15.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-351.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-56
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-351.01.
